heading: HR02184
0: HOUSE RESOLUTION URGING THE DEPARTMENT OF SOCIAL WELFARE AND DEVELOPMENT AND THE LAND BANK OF THE PHILIPPINES TO IMMEDIATELY ENSURE THAT QUALIFIED BENEFICIARIES OF THE VARIOUS SOCIAL WELFARE AND BENEFITS PROGRAM UNDER RA 10963 OR THE TRAIN LAW ARE PROVIDED WITH ATM CARDS FOR THEIR PERSONAL COMFORT AND CONVENIENCE, AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
status: Pending with the Committee on SOCIAL SERVICES since 2018-09-19
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR02184
FULL TITLE : HOUSE RESOLUTION URGING THE DEPARTMENT OF SOCIAL WELFARE AND DEVELOPMENT AND THE LAND BANK OF THE PHILIPPINES TO IMMEDIATELY ENSURE THAT QUALIFIED BENEFICIARIES OF THE VARIOUS SOCIAL WELFARE AND BENEFITS PROGRAM UNDER RA 10963 OR THE TRAIN LAW ARE PROVIDED WITH ATM CARDS FOR THEIR PERSONAL COMFORT AND CONVENIENCE, AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : SANDOVAL, FEDERICO "RICKY" II S.
DATE FILED : 2018-09-17
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON SOCIAL SERVICES ON 2018-09-19
